Ice::

She listened to Veratis explain the plans and prophecy of Primus. She 
thought that what he was talking about was very similar to that of 
the maximals. Only one step above and beyond that.  But what was to 
happen next? The Predacons and the Maximals were currently dominating 
the planet and warring on one another. She wondered if thier little 
group was to become a three bot army, or would Veratis make other 
like them and then they go and defeat all the other bots. To leave 
only the "MUTANTS" to live on this planet. She sighed and continued 
to isten. She hoped that somewhere, some how, they would find a way o 
bring peace amongst the other groups and maybe just co-exist in 
harmony. She shook her head knowing that that dream would never be 
reality
